Package it.polimi.ingsw.commons.message

Class LoginMessage

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.commons.message.Message
it.polimi.ingsw.commons.message.LoginMessage
public class LoginMessage extends Message
Class implements all messages used in the login phase of the communication between client and server, that that is from establishing connection and sending the name.

  • Constructor Details

    • LoginMessage

      public LoginMessage(String sender)
      Used to send Requests
      Parameters:
      sender - the name of the sender of the request, and the name of the request

    • LoginMessage

      public LoginMessage(String sender, boolean accepted, boolean connected)
      Used to send Replies
      Parameters:
      sender - the name of the sender, (always should be a server)
      accepted - true if the requested name is accepted, else false
      connected - true if the connection has been correctly established, else false
